scripts.commit:lib: & { $message = $args[0]; cd lib/; git add --all; git commit --message $message; npm run commit --prefix .. -- $message }
scripts.build: babel ./ --out-dir lib/ --ignore lib/; build; $out = Get-Content package.json | ConvertFrom-Json; $out.name = $out.name.Remove($out.name.Length - 'src'.Length - 1); 'devDependencies','scripts' | ForEach-Object { $out.PSObject.Properties.Remove($_) }; $out | ConvertTo-Json | Out-File -Path lib/package.json -Encoding utf8; Copy-Item -Path rollup.js.flow -Destination lib/
